document_data.mainbody:
The Splintered Stair was an inn located in the city of Waterdeep during the 14 century DR.
The inn was located on the east side of Gut Alley in Waterdeeps Dock Ward in between the intersections of Drawn Sword Alley and Adder Lane.
A large spiraling staircase overlooked by balconies dominated the entry of the inn. The stairway was badly damaged during an epic brawl between adventurers, giving the inn its name. The rooms for rent were large, but also dark and cold.
The Splintered Stair was owned by Shalanna Duthmere during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
